document_data.name: Ansilver
document_data.mainbody: '''Ansilver the Locksmith''' was a shopkeeper in [[Waterdeep]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ansilver managed a shop in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep]], where he created custom locks. Ansilver was a wealthy landowner having many holdings in the [[South Ward of Waterdeep]] and in farmlands east of the city.
document_data.Personality: Ansilver was always alert. He kept his status as a [[cleric]] of [[Gond]] hidden from everyone.
